text:
Below are the error codes from a few non compliant devices. 
0x8024401c 
0x8024002d 
0x8007000d
0x80073701 
When I search with this error codes, below are the common troubleshooting steps
I get, 
1. Stop Windows Update service
2. Rename SoftwareDistribution folder
3. Start Windows Update service
4. Run DISM command to restore health
5. Run Sfc scan
6. Run Windows Troubleshooter
7. Install the update manually

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement]
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from sarathkumargc@gmail.com. Learn why this is
